trans-unit.source: Displays a single column header in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Exibe um cabeçalho de coluna única em um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" />.

trans-unit.source: A column header is an item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control that contains heading text.
trans-unit.target: Um cabeçalho de coluna é um item em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controle que contém o texto do título.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects can be added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objetos podem ser adicionados a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection.Add%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> classe.

trans-unit.source: To add a group of columns to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um grupo de colunas para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection.AddRange%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Index%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> class to determine where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> is located in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Index%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> classe para determinar onde o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> está localizado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> provides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> properties to set the text displayed in the control and the alignment of the text in the column header.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> fornece o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> propriedades para definir o texto exibido no controle e o alinhamento do texto no cabeçalho da coluna.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, you can reference the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ListView%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> está associado com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controle, você pode fazer referência a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ListView%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If you want to copy a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> for use in another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Clone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser copiar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> para uso em outro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controle, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Clone%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The example creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects and sets the column header's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objetos e define o cabeçalho de coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The example also adds items and subitems to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também adiciona itens e subitems para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.

trans-unit.source: To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo colar o código a seguir em um formulário e a chamada a `PopulateListView` método de construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The example creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects and sets the column header's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objetos e define o cabeçalho de coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The example also adds items and subitems to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também adiciona itens e subitems para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.

trans-unit.source: To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo colar o código a seguir em um formulário e a chamada a `PopulateListView` método de construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The index of the image to display in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: O índice da imagem a ser exibida no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> class with the image specified.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> com a imagem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The key of the image to display in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: A chave da imagem a ser exibida no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> class with the image specified.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> com a imagem especificada.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Resizes the width of the column as indicated by the resize style.
trans-unit.target: Redimensiona a largura da coluna, conforme indicado pelo estilo de redimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.AutoResize%2A> method is only effective once the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> and containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> have been constructed, and the column is populated with items.
trans-unit.target: Chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.AutoResize%2A> método estará em vigor somente uma vez a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> e contendo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> foi construída, e a coluna é preenchida com os itens.

trans-unit.source: If new items are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, the column will not resize unless <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.AutoResize%2A> is called again.
trans-unit.target: Se novos itens são adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, a coluna não será redimensionado, a menos que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.AutoResize%2A> é chamado novamente.

trans-unit.source: A value other than <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle.None" /> is passed to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.AutoResize(System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle)" /> method when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View" /> property is a value other than <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor diferente de <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle.None" /> é passado para o método <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.AutoResize(System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle)" /> quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View" /> for um valor diferente de <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an identical copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> that is not attached to any list view control.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia idêntica do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> atual que não está anexada a nenhum controle de exibição de lista.

trans-unit.source: An object representing a copy of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa uma cópia deste objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to copy existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects from an existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control for use in other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controls.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse método para copiar existente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objetos de uma já existente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controle para uso em outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controles.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display order of the column relative to the currently displayed columns.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a ordem de exibição da coluna em relação às colunas exibidas no momento.

trans-unit.source: The display order of the column, relative to the currently displayed columns.
trans-unit.target: A ordem de exibição da coluna em relação às colunas exibidas no momento.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Descarta os recursos (exceto a memória) usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Dispose%2A> quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Dispose%2A> método deixa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> em um estado inutilizável.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Dispose%2A>, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> para a memória estava ocupando pode ser recuperada pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar sua última referência para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> object's destructor.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> está usando não será liberada até que as chamadas de coleta de lixo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> destruidor do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the image displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice da imagem exibida no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: The index of the image displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: O índice da imagem exibida no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> property refers to the index of an image specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> propriedade se refere ao índice de uma imagem especificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> que contém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> property returns -1 if there is no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> set on the containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> propriedade retornará -1 se não houver nenhum <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> definido em que o contém <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.

trans-unit.source: The image displayed in a column is typically used to indicate the state of items in the column.
trans-unit.target: A imagem exibida em uma coluna normalmente é usada para indicar o estado dos itens na coluna.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageKey%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageKey%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> são mutuamente exclusivos, que significa que se um for definido, a outra é definida como um valor inválido e ignorada.

trans-unit.source: The image associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> is typically used to indicate the state information.
trans-unit.target: A imagem associada a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> normalmente é usado para indicar as informações de estado.

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> to a value greater than the index of the last item in the associated image list, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> will be set to the index of the last item in the image list.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> para um valor maior que o índice do último item na lista de imagens associado, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> será definido para o índice do último item na lista de imagens.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex" /> is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex" /> é menor que -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the image displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a chave da imagem exibida na coluna.

trans-unit.source: The key of the image displayed in the column.
trans-unit.target: A chave da imagem exibida na coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageKey%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageKey%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageIndex%2A> propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas, que significa que se um for definido, o outro é definido como um valor inválido e ignorado.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageKey%2A> is set to an invalid value, an image will not be displayed, and an exception will not be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.ImageKey%2A> for definido como um valor inválido, uma imagem não ser exibida, e não será lançada uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: The image associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> is typically used to indicate the state information.
trans-unit.target: A imagem associada a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> normalmente é usado para indicar as informações de estado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the image list associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de imagens associadas ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> retorna o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> propriedade para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> que contém o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control's <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection" /> of this column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o local com o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> dessa coluna.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the column header within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control it is contained in.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do cabeçalho da coluna dentro de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> controle está contida em.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property does not necessarily correspond to the current visual position of the column header within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: O valor dessa propriedade não corresponde à posição atual visual do cabeçalho da coluna dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.

trans-unit.source: This can be due to the user reordering the column headers at run time (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AllowColumnReorder%2A> property is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: Isso pode ter ocorrido porque o usuário reordenar os cabeçalhos de coluna em tempo de execução (quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AllowColumnReorder%2A> está definida como `true`).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> is not contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control this property returns a value of -1.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> não está contido em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controlar essa propriedade retorna um valor de -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> is located in.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> em que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" /> está localizado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control that represents the control that contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> que representa o controle que contém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> object is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para determinar qual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controlar um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objeto está associado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains data to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que contém dados a serem associados ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains data to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que contém os dados para associar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed in the column header.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto exibido no cabeçalho da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the column header.
trans-unit.target: O texto exibido no cabeçalho da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The example creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects and sets the column header's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objetos e define o cabeçalho de coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The example also adds items and subitems to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também adiciona itens e subitems para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.

trans-unit.source: To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo colar o código a seguir em um formulário e a chamada a `PopulateListView` método de construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the text displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alinhamento horizontal do texto exibido em <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment.Left" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment.Left" />.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to provide different text alignment settings for the text displayed in each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para fornecer texto diferente configurações de alinhamento para o texto exibido em cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.

trans-unit.source: Due to a limitation in the underlying control, this property has no effect on the first column in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, which is always aligned to the left.
trans-unit.target: Devido a uma limitação no controle subjacente, essa propriedade não tem efeito sobre a primeira coluna de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controle, que sempre é alinhado à esquerda.

trans-unit.source: To work around this limitation in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and paint the column header yourself.
trans-unit.target: Para contornar essa limitação na [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], você pode manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos e pintar o cabeçalho de coluna por conta própria.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The example creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects and sets the column header's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objetos e define o cabeçalho de coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The example also adds items and subitems to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também adiciona itens e subitems para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.

trans-unit.source: To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo colar o código a seguir em um formulário e a chamada a `PopulateListView` método de construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, if any.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém o nome do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, se houver.

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não deve ser substituído.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, if any, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> contendo o nome do <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, se houver, ou <see langword="null" /> se o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> estiver sem nome.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The width of the column, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A largura da coluna em pixels.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade permite que você defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> can be set to adjust at run time to the column contents or heading.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> pode ser definido para ajustar o tempo de execução para o título ou o conteúdo da coluna.

trans-unit.source: To adjust the width of the longest item in the column, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> property to -1.
trans-unit.target: Para ajustar a largura do item mais longo na coluna, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> propriedade como -1.

trans-unit.source: To autosize to the width of the column heading, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> property to -2.
trans-unit.target: Para o dimensionamento automático para a largura do cabeçalho da coluna, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> propriedade como -2.

trans-unit.source: Unexpected behavior can result when the combined width of all columns exceeds 32,768 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um comportamento inesperado pode surgir quando a largura combinada de todas as colunas excede 32.768 pixels.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controle.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objetos e define o cabeçalho de coluna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.TextAlign%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader.Width%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The example also adds items and subitems to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também adiciona itens e subitems para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.

trans-unit.source: To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo colar o código a seguir em um formulário e a chamada a `PopulateListView` método de construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> manipulador de eventos.
